headline: RXBAR Offers Fed-Up Flyers a $500 "Get Out of Travel B.S. Free" Card
summary: Starting today, RXBAR is stepping in to give weary travelers a way out of summer travel chaos. This season has been one of the busiest in 15 years, with major U.S. airports seeing delay rates of over 30% (Bureau of Transportation, 2025), long lines, packed terminals, and countless trips gone sideways. As the Proud Sponsor of No B.S., RXBAR is launching the Get Out of Travel B.S. Free Card— a national sweepstakes offering frustrated flyers the chance to win a $500 bank-issued, prepaid gift card t
